extension.description: Generate images in VS Code using Gemini API, with prompts generated by GitHub Copilot Language Model API.
command.generateFromSelection.title: Generate Image with Nano Banana Pro
command.generateFreeform.title: Nano Banana: Freeform Image Generation
command.setGeminiApiKey.title: Nano Banana: Set Gemini API Key
config.title: Nano Banana
config.modelId.description: Gemini image model ID. Supports legacy alias gpt-3-pro-image-preview.
config.copilotPromptModel.description: Preferred Copilot model id/family for prompt generation.
config.imageOutputFormat.description: Output image format for saved files.
config.rememberLastStyle.description: Remember the last selected style in workspace.
config.defaultAspectRatio.description: Default aspect ratio for image generation.
config.rememberLastAspectRatio.descripti: Remember the last selected aspect ratio in workspace.
config.displayLanguage.description: UI display language for this extension.
